Metadata.title: Portfolio | Benny Nobre - Full-Stack Developer
Metadata.description: Portfolio of Benny Lucas Nobre de Almeida, a Full-Stack Developer specializing in Angular, React, Next.js, Node.js, and Java.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.description:
Full-Stack Developer focused on delivering high-impact solutions, with proficiency in Angular and Java, and practical experience in React, Next.js, and Node.js through robust personal projects.

My passion for technology and complex challenges provided me the opportunity to collaborate at two distinct times with R&D (Research and Development) labs partnered with Dell Technologies.

I started in the Dell Lead program (2022-2023), where I worked on innovative projects with AI and React. After a break, I was rehired (in 2023) by LAB LDI to take on a Full-Stack role, where I now work on developing large-scale accessibility platforms.

valorant-tracker.title: Valorant Tracker
valorant-tracker.description: A Valorant stats tracker featuring a performance dashboard, match history, and agent analysis.

portfolio-v1.title: Personal Portfolio v1
portfolio-v1.description: My previous personal portfolio, built to learn the fundamentals of HTML and CSS.

lab-ldi.description: I work as a full-stack developer on a website focused on accessibility, delivering a solution that allows people with visual and hearing impairments to consume online courses. My daily work is focused on the microservices architecture with Java and the interactive interface with Angular.

grupo-escalada.description: I actively participated in the development of an e-commerce site, following the SCRUM methodology. I was responsible for building reusable UI components using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, and collaborated on integrating the front-end with the Node.js back-end.

dell-lead.description: Through the Dell Lead program, I participated in Project AppTalk, an innovative application to mediate interaction between users with hearing and auditory impairments. The technical challenge involved integrating MediaPipe (AI) and Three.js (3D) into a React application.

devindev.description: Developed a complete landing page for the SouElo project. I was responsible for the entire lifecycle, from setting up the environment with Docker to delivering the interface in React.js and Next.js.

unifor.role: Higher Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
unifor.description: Higher education focused on software analysis and development.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, work opportunities, or just to chat. Feel free to reach out!
